name: linkedin_extract_profile_info
description: Extract information from a LinkedIn profile page including experience, education, and skills

includeSkills.description: Whether to include skills and endorsements

maxExperience.description: Maximum number of experience entries to extract

waitForLoad.description: Time to wait for profile to load (ms)

toolInfo.emb: LinkedIn profile information extraction tool for public profiles
toolInfo.thought: Manually collecting LinkedIn profile information requires extensive scrolling and clicking. This tool extracts structured profile data in one execution with anti-detection measures.
